text: Nowy Sącz (; ; ; ) is a city in Lesser Poland Voivodeship in Poland. In 2018, 83,896 people lived there. It is at the confluence of the Kamienica River and Dunajec. == Twin towns – sister cities == Nowy Sącz is twinned with: * La Baule-Escoublac, France * Columbia County, United States * Elbląg, Poland * Gabrovo, Bulgaria * Kiskunhalas, Hungary * Massa, Italy * Narvik, Norway * Netanya, Israel * Prešov, Slovakia * Schwerte, Germany * Stará Ľubovňa, Slovakia * Stryi, Ukraine * Suzhou, China * Tarnów, Poland * Trakai, Lithuania * The Wirral, England, United Kingdom == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Lesser Poland Voivodeship
title: Nowy Sącz
